Class Board

java.lang.Object
Board
public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
The game board for the pathfinder.
Author:
Vaishnav Ajith

  • Constructor Summary

    Initializes the gameboard and the tiles within it.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board​(int size)
      Initializes the gameboard and the tiles within it.
      Parameters:
      size - determines how big the gameboard is.

  • Method Details

    • AStarSearch

      public java.util.ArrayList<Tile> AStarSearch​(Tile start, Tile target)
      Method that find the shortest route between 2 tiles. The route consists of an array of tiles, in a specific order. This method uses the A* algorithm.
      Parameters:
      start - The first tile selected by the user.
      target - The second tile selected by the user.

    • intitializeBoard

      public void intitializeBoard()
      Initalizeing all the tiles within a board to default state.

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      String representation of board.
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object

    • toStringNeigbour

      public java.lang.String toStringNeigbour()
      Method used for debugging.

    • getBOARDSIZE

      public int getBOARDSIZE()
      Finds the size of the board.
      Returns:
      size of the board.

    • setTile

      public void setTile​(Position pos, Tile newTile)
      Sets a tile to the gameboard.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the inputted tile.
      newTile - The inputted tile.

    • getTile

      public Tile getTile​(Position pos)
      Gets a tile from the gameboard.
      Parameters:
      pos - The position of the requested tile.
      Returns:
      The requested tile.

    • getGameBoard

      public Tile[][] getGameBoard()
      Returns the entire gameboard
      Returns:
      The gameboard

    • filterPostion

      public java.util.ArrayList<Position> filterPostion​(java.util.ArrayList<Position> posList)
      Returns an array of valid positons in the gameboard.
      Parameters:
      posList - List of position
      Returns:
      A list of valid positon.

    • loadNeighbourHelper

      public void loadNeighbourHelper​(int i, int j)
      Helps loadneigbour method.
      Parameters:
      i - Acts as a x value in Position.
      j - Acts as a y value in Position

    • loadNeighbour

      public void loadNeighbour()
      Loading all the neigbours onto the tile. So each tile now knows which tile is a neigbour to them.

    • unvisitAll

      public void unvisitAll()
      Makes all the tiles in the gameboard unvisited.

    • setGameBoard

      public void setGameBoard​(Tile[][] gameBoard)
      Sets the current gameboard.
      Parameters:
      gameBoard - The current gameboard.
